value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI virtual assistant enables customer self-service support
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy deployed a gen AI-powered virtual assistant that allows customers to troubleshoot product issues, modify order delivery and scheduling, and manage subscriptions and memberships through self-service on BestBuy.com, the app, or phone support.
value_claims.source_quote: a new gen AI-powered virtual assistant that provides customers with a self-service support option when they shop on BestBuy.com, use the Best Buy app, or call Best Buy customer support.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The virtual assistant directly provides self-service support capabilities to customers, with gen AI as the core enabling technology.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI tools enable care agents to resolve customer issues faster
value_claims.claim_description: Gen AI tools assess customer conversations in real-time, provide relevant recommendations and guidance to care agents, detect sentiment, and use call data to prevent future issues, enabling faster resolution of customer queries.
value_claims.source_quote: The tools assess customer conversations in real-time and provide relevant recommendations and guidance. They can also detect sentiment and use data from calls to prevent similar issues in the future.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI tools directly enable agents to solve queries faster through real-time assessment, recommendations, and sentiment detection.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI automates routine tasks for care agents
value_claims.claim_description: Gen AI tools automate routine tasks such as navigating knowledge bases, allowing agents to spend less time searching for information and more time understanding and empathizing with customers.
value_claims.source_quote: Other tools automate routine tasks such as navigating knowledge bases, so agents can spend less time searching for info and more time understanding and empathizing with the customer.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI directly automates knowledge base navigation, freeing agent time for higher-value customer interaction.

value_claims.claim_title: Vertex AI accelerated production cycles through process automation
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy used Vertex AI to automate processes, significantly accelerating experimentation-to-production cycles and enabling teams to deliver solutions faster.
value_claims.source_quote: Accelerated production cycles by automating processes with Vertex AI
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Vertex AI directly enabled automation of processes that accelerated production cycles.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI reduced cost of product Q&A development
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy developed product Q&As at a fraction of the previous cost using Vertex AI and Gemini to generate accurate answers based on product manuals and vendor information.
value_claims.source_quote: Developed product Q&As at a fraction of the previous cost
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI directly enabled cost-efficient generation of product Q&As through automated answer generation.

value_claims.claim_title: Gift Finder tool personalizes product recommendations using gen AI
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy's Gift Finder tool, built on Vertex AI, uses generative AI to simulate a human-like shopping assistant that helps customers select gifts by understanding their preferences and personalizing recommendations.
value_claims.source_quote: Its Gift Finder tool, built on Vertex AI, uses generative AI to simulate a human-like shopping assistant, helping customers select thoughtful gifts by understanding their preferences.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI directly powers the Gift Finder tool to understand preferences and personalize recommendations.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI summarizes product reviews to improve buying decisions
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy uses gen AI summarization capabilities to condense thousands of product reviews into concise insights, improving customer trust and streamlining buying decisions.
value_claims.source_quote: summarization capabilities help the team condense thousands of product reviews into concise insights, improving customer trust and streamlining buying decisions.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI directly summarizes reviews to provide concise insights that improve trust and decision-making.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI solutions increased customer satisfaction
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy's gen AI innovations, including personalization features and support tools, have increased customer satisfaction through improved trust and streamlined experiences.
value_claims.source_quote: Together, these innovations have increased customer satisfaction, improved trust, and optimized revenue generation.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI innovations are directly credited with increasing customer satisfaction through multiple deployed features.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI solutions optimized revenue generation
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy's gen AI innovations have optimized revenue generation through improved customer experiences, personalization, and trust-building features.
value_claims.source_quote: Together, these innovations have increased customer satisfaction, improved trust, and optimized revenue generation.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI contributes to revenue optimization through improved customer satisfaction and trust, but revenue is influenced by multiple factors.

value_claims.claim_title: Gen AI assistant for store employees improves efficiency
value_claims.claim_description: Best Buy is developing a gen AI-powered assistant for store employees to provide easier access to company resources and product guides, allowing them to help customers more efficiently.
value_claims.source_quote: we're working to develop a gen AI-powered assistant to provide easier access to things like company resources and product guides. This will allow them to help customers more efficiently than ever.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Gen AI assistant directly enables store employees to access resources faster and help customers more efficiently.

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy is a consumer electronics retailer
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy is a retailer specializing in consumer electronics, computing and mobile phones, appliances, entertainment products, and home office products.
context_claims.source_quote: Best Buy Co Inc (Best Buy) is a retailer specializing in consumer electronics. The company's product portfolio includes consumer electronics, computing and mobile phones, appliances, entertainment products, and home office products.

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy operates in the retail industry
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy operates in the retail sector, specifically electronics retail.

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy is located in the United States
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy is headquartered and operates in the United States.

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy aims to personalize and humanize the shopping experience
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy's strategy focuses on implementing gen AI in strategic ways to personalize and humanize the consumer electronics shopping experience while solving real human needs.
context_claims.source_quote: At Best Buy we look at how gen AI can help enable our overall enterprise strategy while solving real human needs. We're implementing it in very strategic ways across our organization to personalize and humanize the consumer electronics shopping experience like no one else can.

context_claims.claim_title: Gen AI applied to customer service and support
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy is applying gen AI to customer service and support functions, including virtual assistants and care agent tools.
context_claims.source_quote: a new gen AI-powered virtual assistant that provides customers with a self-service support option when they shop on BestBuy.com, use the Best Buy app, or call Best Buy customer support.

context_claims.claim_title: Gen AI applied to product information management
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy uses gen AI to generate product Q&As and summarize product reviews to support customer buying decisions.
context_claims.source_quote: The team also uses Gemini to generate accurate answers to customers' product queries, based on product manuals and vendor-provided product information

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy offers Geek Squad and membership services
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy provides Geek Squad subscriptions and My Best Buy Memberships as part of its service offerings.
context_claims.source_quote: manage their software and Geek Squad subscriptions and My Best Buy Memberships™

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy partnered with Accenture and Google
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy partnered with Accenture and Google to develop innovative, personalized gen AI solutions for customer and employee support.
context_claims.source_quote: The company has teamed up with Accenture and Google to develop innovative, personalized gen AI solutions that enhance the support experience for both customers and employees.

context_claims.claim_title: Gen AI virtual assistant launched in April 2024
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy announced the launch of its gen AI-powered virtual assistant in April 2024.
context_claims.source_quote: Best Buy Teams With Google on AI-Powered Virtual Assistant By PYMNTS | April 9, 2024

context_claims.claim_title: Best Buy has thousands of care agents
context_claims.claim_description: Best Buy employs thousands of customer care agents who are being equipped with gen AI tools.
context_claims.source_quote: The virtual assistant connects them to one of Best Buy's thousands of care agents who are also equipped with gen AI tools

context_claims.claim_title: Only 31% of organizations have invested significantly in gen AI
context_claims.claim_description: While 97% of organizations believe gen AI will be transformative, only 31% have made significant investments in the technology as of the time of reporting.
context_claims.source_quote: 97% of organizations we surveyed believe it's going to be transformative—only 31% have invested significantly in the technology.

context_claims.claim_title: Brian Tilzer is Chief Digital, Analytics and Technology Officer
context_claims.claim_description: Brian Tilzer serves as Best Buy's Chief Digital, Analytics and Technology Officer.
context_claims.source_quote: Brian Tilzer / Chief Digital, Analytics and Technology Officer, Best Buy
